tool_description: Categorizes items for shipping and tax purposes based on product attributes, dimensions, and regulatory classifications.

product_names.description: Array of product names or descriptions

product_codes.description: Array of SKU or product codes corresponding to product names

weights.description: Array of item weights in pounds

dimensions.description: Array of dimension strings in format 'length x width x height' (inches)

values.description: Array of item values in USD for insurance and customs purposes

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length when provided.
Invalid weight values: All weights must be positive numbers.
Invalid dimension format: Use format 'length x width x height' with numeric values.
Invalid item values: All item values must be non-negative numbers.
Product categorization failed: Unable to determine appropriate category for one or more items.
usage: Provide product_names, weights, dimensions, and values arrays with matching lengths. Optionally include product_codes for more accurate categorization. Returns shipping and tax categories for each item.

shipping_categories.description: Shipping category for each item (standard, fragile, hazardous, oversized)

tax_categories.description: Tax category for each item (general, food, clothing, medical, digital)

restricted_destinations.description: Countries or regions where items cannot be shipped

special_handling_flags.description: Special handling requirements for each item
